original_title: Jo, Une femme dans les bras un cadavre sur le dos
overview: Successful author Antoine falls victim to a blackmailer, Jo. He decides to get rid of him according to his perfect crime scenario, gives up and finally lets him die accidentally. Antoine buries him under a bandstand being built in his garden. But Inspector Ducroc has his suspicions.
title: Jo, Une femme dans les bras un cadavre sur le dos
